00012 #endif

00014 BaseConnectionManager::BaseConnectionManager()
00015   : cSimpleModule()
00016   , nics()
00017   , coreDebug(false)
00018   , sendDirect(false)
00019   , playgroundSize(NULL)
00020   , maxInterferenceDistance(0.0)
00021   , maxDistSquared(0.0)
00022   , useTorus(false)
00023   , drawMIR(false)
00024   , nicGrid()

00029 void BaseConnectionManager::initialize(int stage)
00030 {
00031   //BaseModule::initialize(stage);
00032 
00033   if (stage == 0)
00034   {
00035     if(hasPar("coreDebug"))
00036       coreDebug = par("coreDebug").boolValue();
00037     else
00038       coreDebug = false;
00039 
00040     drawMIR = hasPar("drawMaxIntfDist")
00041             ? par("drawMaxIntfDist").boolValue() : false;
00042 
00043     ccEV <<"initializing BaseConnectionManager\n";
00044 
00045     BaseWorldUtility* world = FindModule<BaseWorldUtility*>
00046 										::findGlobalModule();
00047 
00048     assert(world != 0);
00049 
00050     playgroundSize = world->getPgs();
00051     useTorus = world->useTorus();
00052 
00053     if(hasPar("sendDirect"))
00054       sendDirect = par("sendDirect").boolValue();
00055     else
00056       sendDirect = false;
00057 
00058     maxInterferenceDistance = calcInterfDist();
00059     maxDistSquared = maxInterferenceDistance * maxInterferenceDistance;
00060 
00061     //----initialize node grid-----
00062     //step 1 - calculate dimension of grid
00063     //one cell should have at least the size of maxInterferenceDistance
00064     //but also should divide the playground in equal parts
00065     Coord dim((*playgroundSize) / maxInterferenceDistance);
00066     gridDim = GridCoord(dim);
00067 
00068     //A grid smaller or equal to 3x3 would mean that every cell has every
00069     //other cell as direct neighbor (if our playground is a torus, even if
00070     //not the most of the cells are direct neighbors of each other. So we
00071     //reduce the grid size to 1x1.
00072     if((gridDim.x <= 3) && (gridDim.y <= 3) && (gridDim.z <= 3))
00073     {
00074       gridDim.x = 1;
00075       gridDim.y = 1;
00076       gridDim.z = 1;
00077     } else {
00078       gridDim.x = std::max(1, gridDim.x);
00079       gridDim.y = std::max(1, gridDim.y);
00080       gridDim.z = std::max(1, gridDim.z);
00081     }
00082 
00083     //step 2 - initialize the matrix which represents our grid
00084     NicEntries entries;
00085     RowVector row;
00086     NicMatrix matrix;
00087 
00088     for (int i = 0; i < gridDim.z; ++i) {
00089       row.push_back(entries);     //copy empty NicEntries to RowVector
00090     }
00091     for (int i = 0; i < gridDim.y; ++i) {//fill the ColVector with copies of
00092       matrix.push_back(row);       //the RowVector.
00093     }
00094     for (int i = 0; i < gridDim.x; ++i) { //fill the grid with copies of
00095       nicGrid.push_back(matrix);      //the matrix.
00096     }
00097     ccEV << " using " << gridDim.x << "x" <<
00098                gridDim.y << "x" <<
00099                gridDim.z << " grid" << endl;
00100 
00101     //step 3 -  calculate the factor which maps the coordinate of a node
00102     //      to the grid cell
00103     //if we use a 1x1 grid every coordinate is mapped to (0,0, 0)
00104     findDistance = Coord(std::max(playgroundSize->x, maxInterferenceDistance),
00105                std::max(playgroundSize->y, maxInterferenceDistance),
00106                std::max(playgroundSize->z, maxInterferenceDistance));
00107     //otherwise we divide the playground into cells of size of the maximum
00108     //interference distance
00109     if (gridDim.x != 1)
00110       findDistance.x = playgroundSize->x / gridDim.x;
00111     if (gridDim.y != 1)
00112       findDistance.y = playgroundSize->y / gridDim.y;
00113     if (gridDim.z != 1)
00114       findDistance.z = playgroundSize->z / gridDim.z;
00115 
00116     //since the upper playground borders (at pg-size) are part of the
00117     //playground we have to assure that they are mapped to a valid
00118     //(the last) grid cell we do this by increasing the find distance
00119     //by a small value.
00120     //This also assures that findDistance is never zero.
00121     findDistance += Coord(EPSILON, EPSILON, EPSILON);
00122 
00123     //findDistance (equals cell size) has to be greater or equal
00124     //maxInt-distance
00125     assert(findDistance.x >= maxInterferenceDistance);
00126     assert(findDistance.y >= maxInterferenceDistance);
00127     assert(findDistance.z >= maxInterferenceDistance);
00128 
00129     //playGroundSize has to be part of the playGround
00130     assert(GridCoord(*playgroundSize, findDistance).x == gridDim.x - 1);
00131     assert(GridCoord(*playgroundSize, findDistance).y == gridDim.y - 1);
00132     assert(GridCoord(*playgroundSize, findDistance).z == gridDim.z - 1);
00133     ccEV << "findDistance is " << findDistance.info() << endl;
00134   }
00135   else if (stage == 1)
00136   {
00137 
00138   }
00139 }

00141 BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord BaseConnectionManager
00142 	::getCellForCoordinate(const Coord& c) const
00143 {
00144     return GridCoord(c, findDistance);
00145 }

00147 void BaseConnectionManager::updateConnections(int nicID,
00148                         const Coord* oldPos,
00149                         const Coord* newPos)
00150 {
00151   GridCoord oldCell = getCellForCoordinate(*oldPos);
00152     GridCoord newCell = getCellForCoordinate(*newPos);
00153 
00154   checkGrid(oldCell, newCell, nicID );
00155 }
00156 
00157 BaseConnectionManager::NicEntries& BaseConnectionManager
00158 	::getCellEntries(const BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord& cell)
00159 {
00160     return nicGrid[cell.x][cell.y][cell.z];
00161 }

00163 void BaseConnectionManager::registerNicExt(int nicID)
00164 {
00165   NicEntries::mapped_type nicEntry = nics[nicID];
00166 
00167   GridCoord cell = getCellForCoordinate(nicEntry->pos);
00168 
00169   ccEV <<" registering (ext) nic at loc " << cell.info() << std::endl;
00170 
00171   // add to matrix
00172   NicEntries& cellEntries = getCellEntries(cell);
00173     cellEntries[nicID] = nicEntry;
00174 }
00175 
00176 void BaseConnectionManager::checkGrid(BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord& oldCell,
00177                                       BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord& newCell,
00178                                       int id)
00179 
00180 {
00181 
00182     // structure to find union of grid squares
00183     CoordSet gridUnion(74);
00184 
00185     // find nic at old position
00186     NicEntries&             oldCellEntries = getCellEntries(oldCell);
00187     NicEntries::iterator    it  = oldCellEntries.find(id);
00188     NicEntries::mapped_type nic = it->second;
00189 
00190 
00191     // move nic to a new position in matrix
00192     if(oldCell != newCell) {
00193       oldCellEntries.erase(it);
00194       getCellEntries(newCell)[id] = nic;
00195     }
00196 
00197   if((gridDim.x == 1) && (gridDim.y == 1) && (gridDim.z == 1)) {
00198     gridUnion.add(oldCell);
00199     } else {
00200     //add grid around oldPos
00201     fillUnionWithNeighbors(gridUnion, oldCell);
00202 
00203 
00204         if(oldCell != newCell) {
00205             //add grid around newPos
00206             fillUnionWithNeighbors(gridUnion, newCell);
00207         }
00208     }
00209 
00210     GridCoord* c = gridUnion.next();
00211     while(c != 0) {
00212     ccEV << "Update cons in [" << c->info() << "]" << endl;
00213     updateNicConnections(getCellEntries(*c), nic);
00214     c = gridUnion.next();
00215     }
00216 }
00217 
00218 int BaseConnectionManager::wrapIfTorus(int value, int max) const {
00219   if(value < 0) {
00220     if(useTorus) {
00221       return max + value;
00222     } else {
00223       return -1;
00224     }
00225   } else if(value >= max) {
00226     if(useTorus) {
00227       return value - max;
00228     } else {
00229       return -1;
00230     }
00231   } else {
00232     return value;
00233   }
00234 }
00235 
00236 void BaseConnectionManager::fillUnionWithNeighbors(CoordSet& gridUnion,
00237                            const GridCoord& cell) const
00238 {
00239   for(int iz = (int)cell.z - 1; iz <= (int)cell.z + 1; iz++) {
00240     int cz = wrapIfTorus(iz, gridDim.z);
00241     if(cz == -1) {
00242       continue;
00243     }
00244     for(int ix = (int)cell.x - 1; ix <= (int)cell.x + 1; ix++) {
00245       int cx = wrapIfTorus(ix, gridDim.x);
00246       if(cx == -1) {
00247         continue;
00248       }
00249       for(int iy = (int)cell.y - 1; iy <= (int)cell.y + 1; iy++) {
00250         int cy = wrapIfTorus(iy, gridDim.y);
00251         if(cy != -1) {
00252           gridUnion.add(GridCoord(cx, cy, cz));
00253         }
00254       }
00255     }
00256   }
00257 }
00258 
00259 bool BaseConnectionManager::isInRange(BaseConnectionManager::NicEntries::mapped_type pFromNic, BaseConnectionManager::NicEntries::mapped_type pToNic)
00260 {
00261   double dDistance = 0.0;
00262 
00263     if(useTorus) {
00264       dDistance = pFromNic->pos.sqrTorusDist(pToNic->pos, playgroundSize);
00265     } else {
00266       dDistance = pFromNic->pos.sqrdist(pToNic->pos);
00267     }
00268     return (dDistance <= maxDistSquared);
00269 }
00270 
00271 void BaseConnectionManager::updateNicConnections(NicEntries& nmap, BaseConnectionManager::NicEntries::mapped_type   nic)
00272 {
00273     int id = nic->nicId;
00274 
00275     for(NicEntries::iterator i = nmap.begin(); i != nmap.end(); ++i) {
00276       NicEntries::mapped_type nic_i = i->second;
00277 
00278         // no recursive connections
00279         if ( nic_i->nicId == id ) continue;
00280 
00281         bool inRange   = isInRange(nic, nic_i);
00282         bool connected = nic->isConnected(nic_i);
00283 
00284         if ( inRange && !connected ) {
00285             // nodes within communication range: connect
00286             // nodes within communication range && not yet connected
00287             ccEV << "nic #" << id << " and #" << nic_i->nicId
00288                << " are in range" << endl;
00289             nic->connectTo( nic_i );
00290             nic_i->connectTo( nic );
00291         }
00292         else if ( !inRange && connected ) {
00293             // out of range: disconnect
00294             // out of range, and still connected
00295             ccEV << "nic #" << id << " and #" << nic_i->nicId
00296                << " are NOT in range" << endl;
00297             nic->disconnectFrom( nic_i );
00298             nic_i->disconnectFrom( nic );
00299         }
00300     }
00301 }
00302 
00303 bool BaseConnectionManager::registerNic(cModule* nic,
00304                     ChannelAccess* chAccess,
00305                     const Coord* nicPos)
00306 {
00307   assert(nic != 0);
00308 
00309   int nicID = nic->getId();
00310   ccEV << " registering nic #" << nicID << endl;
00311 
00312   // create new NicEntry
00313   NicEntries::mapped_type nicEntry;
00314 
00315   if(sendDirect)
00316     nicEntry = new NicEntryDirect(coreDebug);
00317   else
00318     nicEntry = new NicEntryDebug(coreDebug);
00319 
00320   // fill nicEntry
00321   nicEntry->nicPtr   = nic;
00322   nicEntry->nicId    = nicID;
00323   nicEntry->hostId   = FindModule<>::findHost(nic)->getId();
00324   nicEntry->pos      = nicPos;
00325   nicEntry->chAccess = chAccess;
00326 
00327   // add to map
00328   nics[nicID] = nicEntry;
00329 
00330   registerNicExt(nicID);
00331 
00332   updateConnections(nicID, nicPos, nicPos);
00333 
00334   if(drawMIR) {
00335     FindModule<>::findHost(nic)->getDisplayString().setTagArg("r", 0, maxInterferenceDistance);
00336   }
00337 
00338   return sendDirect;
00339 }
00340 
00341 bool BaseConnectionManager::unregisterNic(cModule* nicModule)
00342 {
00343   assert(nicModule != 0);
00344 
00345   // find nicEntry
00346   int nicID = nicModule->getId();
00347   ccEV << " unregistering nic #" << nicID << endl;
00348 
00349   //we assume that the module was previously registered with this CM
00350   //TODO: maybe change this to an omnet-error instead of an assertion
00351   assert(nics.find(nicID) != nics.end());
00352   NicEntries::mapped_type nicEntry = nics[nicID];
00353 
00354   // get all affected grid squares
00355   CoordSet gridUnion(74);
00356   GridCoord cell = getCellForCoordinate(nicEntry->pos);
00357   if((gridDim.x == 1) && (gridDim.y == 1) && (gridDim.z == 1)) {
00358     gridUnion.add(cell);
00359   } else {
00360     fillUnionWithNeighbors(gridUnion, cell);
00361   }
00362 
00363   // disconnect from all NICs in these grid squares
00364   GridCoord* c = gridUnion.next();
00365   while(c != 0) {
00366     ccEV << "Update cons in [" << c->info() << "]" << endl;
00367     NicEntries& nmap = getCellEntries(*c);
00368     for(NicEntries::iterator i = nmap.begin(); i != nmap.end(); ++i) {
00369       NicEntries::mapped_type other = i->second;
00370       if (other == nicEntry) continue;
00371       if (!other->isConnected(nicEntry)) continue;
00372       other->disconnectFrom(nicEntry);
00373       nicEntry->disconnectFrom(other);
00374     }
00375     c = gridUnion.next();
00376   }
00377 
00378   // erase from grid
00379   NicEntries& cellEntries = getCellEntries(cell);
00380   cellEntries.erase(nicID);
00381 
00382   // erase from list of known nics
00383   nics.erase(nicID);
00384 
00385   return true;
00386 }
00387 
00388 void BaseConnectionManager::updateNicPos(int nicID, const Coord* newPos)
00389 {
00390   NicEntries::iterator ItNic = nics.find(nicID);
00391   if (ItNic == nics.end())
00392     error("No nic with this ID (%d) is registered with this ConnectionManager.", nicID);
00393 
00394     Coord oldPos = ItNic->second->pos;
00395     ItNic->second->pos = newPos;
00396 
00397   updateConnections(nicID, &oldPos, newPos);
00398 }

00400 const NicEntry::GateList& BaseConnectionManager::getGateList(int nicID) const
00401 {
00402   NicEntries::const_iterator ItNic = nics.find(nicID);
00403   if (ItNic == nics.end())
00404     error("No nic with this ID (%d) is registered with this ConnectionManager.", nicID);
00405 
00406     return ItNic->second->getGateList();
00407 }
00408 
00409 const cGate* BaseConnectionManager::getOutGateTo(const NicEntry* nic,
00410                          const NicEntry* targetNic) const
00411 {
00412   NicEntries::const_iterator ItNic = nics.find(nic->nicId);
00413   if (ItNic == nics.end())
00414     error("No nic with this ID (%d) is registered with this ConnectionManager.", nic->nicId);
00415 
00416     return ItNic->second->getOutGateTo(targetNic);
00417 }
00418 
00419 BaseConnectionManager::~BaseConnectionManager()
00420 {
00421   for (NicEntries::iterator ne = nics.begin(); ne != nics.end(); ne++) {
00422     delete ne->second;
00423   }
00424 }
